s9.message: Fixed: List of blockable items and context menu don't work correctly in Firefox 3.5 and SeaMonkey 2.0 (bug 23890).

s8.message: Fixed: Filter statistics aren't reset in Firefox 4 if browsing history is cleared on browser shutdown (forum topic).

s3.message: Slightly decreased delay when new browser windows are opened.

s2.message: Brasilian Portuguese translation has been added again.

s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.3.6.

s10.message: Fixed: Bogus tooltip text shows up for the cross button next to "Recommend us on Facebook".

s7.message: Fixed: Undesired side-effects of resizing the list of blockable items if an extension like Vertical Tabs is installed (bug 23890).

s6.message: Fixed wrong suggestion in filter composer ({1} filter option specified incorrectly).

s5.message:
Fixed: When images are highlighted via list of blockable items the flashing border
    isn't visible.

s4.message: Fixed: Tabs on Flash and Java mights leak memory under some rare conditions.
